name: Low Impact Fishers of Europe
goal: LIFE provides representation and support to low impact, small scale fishermen and their organisations across Europe. Our aims are to promote sustainable fishing, support our members and provide a voice for them in Brussels and elsewhere.
interests: Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives:
Common Fisheries Policy
European Maritime and Fisheries Fund
Water Framework Directive
Marine Strategy Framework Directive
Habitats Directive
